backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing daily affirmation messages, user authentication with access control, daily check-in streak tracking, user profile management, and background music upload functionality with role-based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: a share button for daily affirmations and formatted share messages with attribution, both with high confidence and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components for authentication, mood check-in, streak tracking, profile setup, and sharing functionality with Web Share API and clipboard fallback.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining a calming color palette and design tokens for the application's visual system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Version 10 meta tag, application title 'Stay Beautifully Positive', and script reference to the React TypeScript main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component that sets up QueryClient with retry configuration, ThemeProvider for light theme, and renders MainPage with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component using Internet Identity that handles login/logout with loading states, error handling for duplicate authentication, and clears query cache on logout.
Card component for daily mood check-in with four mood options (great, good, okay, low), authentication guards, and toast notifications that celebrate streak extensions only when the count increases.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts authenticated users to enter their name with form validation, loading states, and prevents dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/StreakCard.tsx: React component that displays the user's daily check-in streak count with authentication-gated access, loading states, error handling, and a gradient-styled flame icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching daily messages, streak info, user profiles, and performing mood check-ins with optimistic updates and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useShareAffirmation.t: Custom hook that enables sharing affirmations via Web Share API with clipboard fallback, formatting messages and handling errors with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette for a calming theme (sky, lavender, rose, deep, soft) and dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/music/tracks.ts: Empty file, likely intended for music track definitions or configurations.
frontend/src/pages/MainPage.tsx: Main page component that displays daily affirmations with authentication, profile setup, streak tracking, mood check-in, and share functionality using Internet Identity and various custom hooks.
frontend/src/utils/formatShareMessage.ts: Utility function that formats affirmation text for sharing by appending attribution text 'â€” Daily Affirmations'.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/version.ts: Exports the application version constant set to 'Version 10'.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended animations, typography plugin, and container queries support.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting the Daily Affirmations app with completed features for sharing affirmations with attribution and one pending feature request.
